title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
### Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls

**Product Highlights:**
- **12 Rolls of Premium Quality:** Get 12 huge rolls of Amazon Brand Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, each containing 158 sheets.
- **2-Ply Sheets:** Each roll is made of 2-ply sheets, ensuring strength and absorbency.
- **High Absorbency:** These paper towels are up to 75% more absorbent compared to leading 1-ply brands, making them perfect for cleaning up spills and messes quickly and efficiently.
- **Flex-a-Size Technology:** The unique Flex-a-Size feature allows you to tear sheets to the size you need, reducing waste and maximizing value.
- **White Color:** The clean, white color makes these towels suitable for a variety of household tasks.
- **Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls:** Despite the fewer rolls, the large size and high absorbency mean these 12 rolls are equivalent to 38 regular rolls, providing great value.
- **Comparison to Bounty:** Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels offer superior absorbency and performance compared to Bounty Paper Towels.

**Product Details:**
- **Total Rolls:** 12
- **Sheet Count per Roll:** 158 sheets
- **Roll Type:** Huge Roll
- **Ply:** 2-ply
- **Absorbency:** 75% more absorbent versus leading 1-ply brand
- **Equivalent to Regular Rolls:** 38 regular rolls (49 sheets each)
- **Packaging:** Comes in 2 packs of 6 rolls each
- **Color:** White

**Why Choose Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels?**
- **Value for Money:** With 12 huge rolls equivalent to 38 regular rolls, you get more cleaning power for your money.
- **Convenient and Efficient:** The Flex-a-Size feature allows you to use just the right amount of towel, reducing waste.
- **High Performance:** Whether you're cleaning up a spill, wiping down surfaces, or handling everyday messes, these towels are up to the task.
- **Eco-Friendly:** By using fewer rolls and reducing waste, you contribute to a more sustainable household.

**Ideal for:**
- **Daily Cleaning:** Kitchens, bathrooms, and other areas of the home.
- **Entertaining:** Perfect for parties and gatherings where spills and messes are common.
- **On-the-Go:** The compact packaging makes it easy to take a roll with you for travel or outdoor activities.

**Customer Satisfaction:**
- **Highly Rated:** Customers love the absorbency, strength, and value of Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels.
- **Money-Back Guarantee:** If you're not satisfied, Amazon Brand offers a money-back guarantee.

**Order Now and Experience the Superior Quality and Value of Amazon Brand Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels!**
